quotes.quote: The air of summer was sweeter than wine.
The air of ideas is the only air worth breathing.
The air is the only place free from prejudice.
Air, an undervalued necessity, that earns your gratitude when you inhale it for the last time.
Air and manners are more expressive than words.
Every breath of air we take is coming from the ocean.
The air of one's native country is the most healthy air.
Wind is a floating wave of air, whose undulation continually varies.
To keep the air fresh among words is the secret of verbal cleanliness.
The water is clearer than the air, and the air is the air that angels breathe.
The air has finally gotten to the place that we can breathe it together.
The air we see in the paintings of the old masters is never the air we breathe.
The air is crowded with birds – beautiful, tender, intelligent birds – to whom life is a song.
Air is the very substance of our freedom, the substance of superhuman joy.... aerial joy is freedom.
This air we breathe is precious, and the glaciers helped me understand that and stay focused on that.
Air is beautiful, yet you cannot see it. It's soft, yet you cannot touch it. Air is a little like my brain.
Fresh air is good if you do not take too much of it; most of the achievements and pleasures of life are in bad air.
The very air in which you live is an inspiration.
Best way to clear the air is to have it all out in the open.
The air is all softness.
Compressed air can provide limitless amounts of clean energy using technology we have had for hundreds of years.
